titleInfo.title: Billy "Crash" Craddock at the Arena Building (16874)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (navy and red on lgiht brown) announcing Billy "Crash" Craddock with Sunday Sharpe and Sounds of Music at the Arena Building in Cape Girardeau, Missouri on November 7. Poster feature metal photoplates of Billy Craddock and Sunday Sharpe. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40393.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
